Events > February 19, 2013

#45 GravityTank's Electronic Medical Record Redesign

I’m super excited to announce that GravityTank’s Amy Guterman and friends will be joining us for this Tuesday’s hack night.

Amy and co. recently redesigned electronic medical records into a useful and beautiful health tool for the White House’s Health Design Challenge. They’ll chat about the project, life, love, design, and everything in between. (And all in 20 minutes!)
Sponsor None
